creator: riittatv@iki.fi
text:
Hi, 
I am not sure if this is a bug or an enhancement :)

I would like to use in the HTTP post request both a "normal" parameter, for 
example type the parameter name in the "Send parameters in the request" 
(filename=thisisafilename) and also the actual file, when I type the  actual 
file location and parameter name in the lower part in the "Send a file in the 
request". 

Now it seems that the parameter filename is included in the HTTP request, but 
the actual file is not. 

I would like to ask if this is a feature in JMeter, or a bug ? Anyway I suggest 
that both types of parameters could be used in the same request. 

I am using the nightly build from 8th March 2004.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: I think this is now working. Please reopen with further details if not
